posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: apline_install_nginx
posts.text: 安装nginx1apk add nginx 创建网页目录12mkdir /wwwchown -R www:www /www 编辑配置文件1cp /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf{,.bak} 1234567891011server { listen 80; root /www; index index.html index.htm; server_name localhost; client_max_body_size 32m; error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; location = /50x.html { root /var/lib/nginx/html; } } 启动服务1rc-service nginx start 加入到开机1rc-update add nginx default 123rc-service nginx stoprc-service nginx restartrc-service nginx reload
